name: Graham Corporation
description: Graham Corporation is a leading designer and manufacturer of vacuum and heat transfer equipment for a variety of industries, including petrochemical, power generation, and defense. Founded in 1936, Graham Corporation has established a reputation for technological innovation and high-quality products, with a focus on delivering customized solutions that meet the specific needs of its clients. The company’s flagship products include vacuum systems, steam jet ejectors, and heat exchangers, which are essential for optimizing production processes and improving energy efficiency. Graham Corporation operates with a commitment to sustainability, focusing on reducing environmental impact through advanced engineering and design. The company’s skilled workforce and engineering expertise allow it to tackle complex challenges in thermal and vacuum technology, serving a global customer base. With a history of growth and innovation, Graham Corporation continues to adapt to market demands and explore new applications for its technologies, ensuring its position as a market leader in the vacuum and heat transfer equipment sector.
